scripts.bench-file: spago build --package bench && node --expose-gc --input-type="module" -e "import { main } from './output/BenchFile/index.js';main()"
scripts.parse-file: spago build --package bench && node --input-type="module" -e "import { main } from './output/ParseFile/index.js';main()"
scripts.format: purs-tidy format-in-place src test bench parse-package-set
scripts.format:check: purs-tidy check src test bench parse-package-set
